com.defano.jmonet.tools.base

Class AbstractPolylineTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.PaintTool
      • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.AbstractPolylineTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanvasCommitObserver, SurfaceInteractionObserver, KeyListener, EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CurveTool, PolygonTool

    public abstract class AbstractPolylineTool
extends PaintTool
    Mouse and keyboard handler for tools that define multiple segments/points along a path. Click to define a point, double-click to close/complete the shape. When the shift key is held down, line segments will be constrained to the nearest 15-degree angle.

      • strokePolyline

        protected abstract void strokePolyline(Graphics2D g,
                                       Stroke stroke,
                                       Paint strokePaint,
                                       int[] xPoints,
                                       int[] yPoints)
        Draws one or more sides (edges) of a polygon which is not filled and may not be closed.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics context on which to draw.
        stroke - The current stroke context.
        strokePaint - The current paint context.
        xPoints - An array of x points, see Graphics.drawPolyline(int[], int[], int)
        yPoints - An array of y points, see Graphics.drawPolyline(int[], int[], int)

                                    Paint fillPaint,
